description: The iPhone 12 is equipped with an OLED panel with the same diagonal as its predecessor iPhone 11 - 6.1 inches. The resolution is higher: 2532x1170 pixels, so the pixel density is 460 per inch (Retina XDR). The image is really impressive.
ARM-based MediaTek MT8183, processor ARM Mali-G72 MP3, video card 4GB DDR4, of Ram 32GB EMMC, storage 11.6 inch display, Chrome OS.
